title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting P2 and attempting to close it, the 'Close project' option is not always available in the Navigator.
EB: The 'Close project' option should be available when selecting any project in the Navigator, including P2.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select P2 in the Navigator. 
3. Observe that the 'Close project' option is not always available.
